questionTitle: Which of the following should be used considering factors shown in the figure?
questionExplanation: Use RDS when you have an existing MySQL database that could be ported and you want to minimize the amount of infrastructure and administrative management required.

questionOption1: Amazon Machine Instances are sized at various levels and rented on a computing/hour basis
questionOption2: The metrics obtained by CloudWatch may be used to enable a feature called Auto Scaling
questionOption3: A number of tools are used to support EC2 services
questionExplanation: Through hardware virtualization on Xen hypervisors, Amazon.com has made it possible to create private virtual servers that you can run worldwide.

questionTitle: Which of the following is an edge-storage or content-delivery system that caches data in different physical locations?
questionExplanation:
Cloudfront is similar to systems such as Akamai.com, but is proprietary to Amazon.com and is set up to work with Amazon Simple Storage
System (Amazon S3).

questionTitle: Which of the following allows you to create instances of the MySQL database to support your Web sites?
questionExplanation: RDS provides features such as automated software patching, database backups, and automated database scaling via an API call.

questionOption1: Amazon Elastic Cloud is a system for creating virtual disks(volume)
questionOption2: SimpleDB interoperates with both Amazon EC2 and Amazon S3
questionOption3: EC3 is an Analytics as a Service provider
questionExplanation: Amazon SimpleDB stores data in “buckets” and without requiring the creation of a database schema.

questionTitle: Which of the following is a structured data store that supports indexing and data queries to both EC2 and S3?
questionExplanation: SimpleDB isn’t a full database implementation.

questionTitle: Which of the following is the machinery for interacting with Amazon’s vast product data and eCommerce catalog function?
questionExplanation:
This service, which was called Amazon E-Commerce Service (ECS), is the means for vendors to add their products to the Amazon.com site
and take orders and payments.

questionTitle: Which of the following is a billing and account management service?
questionExplanation: DevPay provides a developer API that eliminates the need for application developers to build order pipelines.

questionTitle: Which of the following is a means for accessing human researchers or consultants to help solve problems on a contractual or temporary basis?
questionExplanation: Problems solved by this human workforce have included object identification, video or audio recording, data duplication, and data research.

questionTitle: Which of the following is built on top of a Hadoop framework using the Elastic Compute Cloud?
questionExplanation: Amazon Elastic MapReduce is an interactive data analysis tool for performing indexing.
